Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery jar, the interior is pitted and off-white in colour, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted Greek (?) text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394164) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394164)
